bibl.title: Dispatch from Robert S. Newton to Frederick W. Seward
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener:
No. 27
United States Consulate
at St. Paul de Loanda
18th September 1878.
div1.p:
Sir,
I have the honor to acknowledge receipt of a Box of stationary & flags forwarded from Liverpool by Consul Fairchild for the use of this Consulate.

I have to remind the Department the necessity of sending a new Consular seal of office now that this post had been made a consulate. That at present in use bears the impression U.S. Commercial Agency. St Paul de Loanda.

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be
Sir,
Your obedt. Servt.

address.addrLine: To The Assistant Secretary of State
